reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress flattering for many body types and appreciate its built-in shapewear that creates an hourglass shape. The dress receives positive feedback for its fit, with one customer noting it goes past the knees, and customers describe it as comfortable and good quality. While customers find the dress gorgeous and easy to put on, several mention it is extremely difficult to get on. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised
items.body: Iâ€™m actually surprised at how well this looked. Thought it was a lost cause finding a dress that would look alright on me, but this was flattering. Worth the money, the length goes past the knees, the quality is great and stretchy and holds things in where you want to hold in. Read more
items.author: Nathan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, super slimming
items.body: I tried this dress hoping it will slim me a bit and still feel good enough to not feel like i am wearing an unbreathable shapewear. Itâ€™s truly amazing. Fits like a glove! I have a bit of a tummy and this doesnâ€™t totally get rid of it, but gives me a smoothed out look and makes me feel confident. Thereâ€™s a bodysuit inside so you have to slowly shimmy it up like you are putting on pants. Slow and steady wins the race for this dress haha. But once in place, it feels amazing and is a nice quality. Does not feel cheap. The black is super classy, and i bet the other colors look nice. I for into and xl perfectly fine and yes it was a struggle to get on at the beginning. Very easy to take off though. I am 5â€™5â€ small chest and bigger stomach, hips and thighs. Roughly 190lbs give or take. Hope that helps, if youâ€™re on the fence just try it. It also looked nice as a strapless! Not sure it can be worn that way but Iâ€™d def get it as a tube dress for sure! Read more
items.author: Adrienne Starkov

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy yours now ðŸ‘ first time wearing this body shaping dress and I love it
items.body: Very comfortable, breathable, and stretchy! Shapeware built inside of dress does provide a tummy control and allows. You easy access to the restroom without taking the dress off. Very satisfied and looking forward to purchasing more dresses in different colors! Read more
items.author: ViViaNa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits my waist and thighs!
items.body: First-please ignore my dirty mirror. Lol. Now for the review, for reference I'm 5'2. 130 lbs. 27" waist and 42" at my thighs. My hips aren't that wide, I'm biggest at my thighs. It was mostly flattering and it's still in the running for my work holiday party but it's just so tight at the waist, I'm not sure I can wear it all night. There was so much relief taking it off after only wearing it for 20 minutes. I don't really need that much compression at my waist, most of my weight is in my thighs. I love that it molded to everything though. Normally dresses like this are loose in my waist. It's very rare for something to feel too tight in the waist and also fit my thighs! In fact, I probably could have gone up to a medium but I got a small. I haven't decided if I'm returning this. And yes, like the other reviews said, it's HARD to get on. You definitely have to do the side to side hip shimmy. Once it was up over my butt then it was smooth sailing! Read more
items.author: casy321

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress - fit and look
items.body: I love this dress! Perfect fit and smoothes out all the imperfections. Read more
items.author: Grace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning dress!
items.body: This dress is so comfortable! I was anticipating something uncomfortable because in the past I bought other dresses like that and they were far too tight. It had the right amount of stretch to it so it wasnâ€™t restricting at all. The built in shape wear was super comfortable also. The material stayed and didnâ€™t roll up like some others do. Itâ€™s absolutely perfect for the price! I recommend this to anyone who is considering buying. Read more
items.author: JB Martinez

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to use the bathroom in
items.body: Its nice and good quality, but you have to fully undress to go to the bathroom or risk urinating all over your dress through the tiny crotch slit. There are just not enough hands to hold aside your panties while simultaneously stretching the slit, pee, then wipe properly. Gross experience It would be great if you could just pull the bottoms down... But the fit and look are perfect. Size up if you do not like too snug because the shape wear is holding stuff in!! Read more
items.author: crystal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect black dress
items.body: Beautiful sexy dress and helps accentuate my curves with the built-in shapewear. Read more
items.author: SE

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Grey Midi Dress, Blue Midi Dress, Pink Midi Dress, Red Midi Dress, Green Midi Dress, Nut Red Midi Dress, Purple Midi Dress, Black Midi Dress, Brown Midi Dress. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
